name: Harshit Toky

projects.title: Face Recognition using openCV
projects.description: Developed a real - time face recognition system using OpenCV , integrating Haar Cascades , HOG , deep learning , and LBPH for detection and classification . Optimized accuracy and performance with hyperparameter tuning and GPU acceleration .

projects.title: Investigation on Personal Assistant Nurse Robots
projects.description: This research explores Personal Assistant Nurse ( PAN ) robots in healthcare , focusing on their role in addressing rising demands . It examines their hardware , software , and challenges like trust , security , and errors . The study emphasizes ongoing RD and integration , positioning PAN robots as key collaborators in modern healthcare .

projects.title: Banking Software
projects.description: Developed a robust banking application in Java utilizing Swing for a sleek user interface . Integrated with MySQL for efficient data management , ensuring secure and seamless financial transactions . TECHNICAL
